overview: Simon jr (Hogan Peterson) inherited the wealth from his father who died of covid19. he spend his late father's money with no limits hence calling for the business downfall, as Tasha (Namutebi Munirah) who was a slay queen and she used to spend more than she earned. Mr. Mutebi (Ssali Matia) was an ordinary businessman who invested in the wrong pyramid circle. Alpha (Emma Vito) was a hardworking uber driver who was addicted to investing in forex trading and sports betting. They all ended up losing all they had because everyone was hiding their motives hence #Hiddenagendafilm
tagline: We all have something to hide!
title: Hidden Agenda
